About Me

I'm a Software Engineer specializing in Unity Game Development with over 4 years of professional experience.

My expertise lies in creating engaging mobile games across various genres including Casual, Hyper-Casual, Hybrid Casual, Idle, and Arcade games. I'm passionate about crafting smooth gameplay experiences and implementing innovative game mechanics.

Currently working on game development projects while exploring new technologies and best practices in the game industry. I enjoy solving complex problems and optimizing game performance for the best player experience.
